version_description:
Thank you all for your ratings and comments, in this version..
- Date picker fix for incorrect year for dates in January
- Subtitle is now optional
- Available in 5 new languages
- Minor bug fixes

Event Countdown 2.0 is finally here, our biggest ever update. Thank you so much to the thousands of you who have taken the time to rate and review our little app. We really do appreciate your support and have listened to your feedback.

We have redesigned the app from the ground up to make it even more beautiful, easy to use and give you the new features you have been asking for including notifications, the option to remove ads, synchronising events to all your devices and repeat events. We're working on lots of other cool features too, which will be released in the coming weeks, so be sure to rate our little app and let us know your views.

Bug Fixes including startup crash and all day event crash. Some users have reported missing events since updating, if this is the case for you please try the following:- Tap the Menu button top left, then tap Diagnostics at the bottom and tap Import Legacy Database.

In this release - syncing between devices issue resolved, time added to events list, time / date pickers are localised, improved performance, reduced app size and other minor bug fixes.

Some users have reported missing events since updating, if this is the case for you please try the following:- Tap the Menu button top left, then tap Diagnostics at the bottom and tap Import Legacy Database.
